chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This is a valid DocBook 5.0 document that can be used to test validation against arbitrary schemas using the vnu CLI validator with the --schema option.

section.title: Background
section.para: DocBook is a semantic markup language for technical documentation. It was originally intended for writing technical documents related to computer hardware and software.
